trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the security policy requires code to be type safe and the verification process is unable to verify that the code is type safe.
trans-unit.target: 当安全策略要求代码是类型安全的但验证过程无法验证该代码是否是类型安全的时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.VerificationException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_VERIFICATION.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.VerificationException> 使用 HRESULT COR_E_VERIFICATION。

trans-unit.source: A message indicating the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 一条指示异常发生原因的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class with an explanatory message.
trans-unit.target: 用说明性消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.VerificationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Security.VerificationException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
